a.title: See What I Did There?
a.data-content: It's really not so complicated, you just put this HTML together with the Javascript and CSS, bake for about 10 minutes, and you have context!

html.h4: example from Splunk Dev For All App, extended by theming

search.query: index="_internal" | append [ | makeresults count=100 | eval field1=if((random()%3) == 1, "Option A", "Option B") | eval field2=if((random()%5) == 1, "Option A", "Option B") | eval field3=if((random()%3) == 1, "Option A", "Option B") | eval field4=if((random()%2) == 1, "Option A", "Option B") | rename field2 AS "extra long descriptionalble field name" ] | table "extra long descriptionalble field name" field*
